General.Name: UniTest Incorporation
General.Description: UniTest Incorporation manufactures and sells semiconductor testing equipment in South Korea. It provides component, module, and application level testers; and LED street, security, and flat panel lighting products, as well as converters. The company was formerly known as ISOA TECH, Inc. and changed its name to UniTest Incorporation in September 2002. UniTest Incorporation was founded in 2000 and is based in Yongin, South Korea.
